original_text: The other things that happened while Jehoiakim was king are written in a book. The book is called ‘The history of the kings of Israel and Judah’. It tells about the disgusting sins that he was guilty of.
korean_text: 여호야김의 남은 사적과 그가 행한 모든 가증한 일들과 그에게 발견된 악행이 이스라엘과 유다 열왕기에 기록되니라 그의 아들 여호야긴이 대신하여 왕이 되니라

sentences.original_text: The other things that happened while Jehoiakim was king
sentences.korean_translation: 여호야킴이 왕으로 있을 때 일어난 다른 일들은

sentences.original_text: 'The history of the kings of Israel and Judah'
the disgusting sins that he was guilty of
